name: Circular Soccer - Around The World Football Game
name_original: Circular Soccer - Around The World Football Game
description:
Play Soccer Around the World!!

Send the ball rolling around the world by kicking it towards opponents to knock them down! Time your kick well to generate maximum power!

Game Features:
- Intuitive Controls
- Addictive Gameplay
- Unlock your favorite superstars!!
- Rich, High Quality Graphics.
